min-max-first-name: Firstname must be between 2 and 30 characters long.
min-max-last-name: Lastname must be between 2 and 30 characters long.
cannot-have-special-character: You can use letters (a-Z), numbers (0-9) and special characters (. - _).
password-rule: Use 8-40 characters with a mix of letters, numbers & special characters.
incorrect-retype-password: The password and confirmation password do not match
